titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 5) to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for human embryonic stem cell research.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-179, by Ms. Matsui.
All points of order against the bill and against its consideration are waived except those arising under clause 10 of rule XXI. A motion to commit is in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 72.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 464.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 195 (Roll no. 440).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 191 (Roll no. 441).

bill.summary: 6/7/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of S. 5 (Stem Cell Research Enhancement Act of 2007).
